sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FetchWorkflowClusteringEnabler</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>FetchWorkflowClusteringEnabler</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FetchWorkflowClusteringEnabler = Class.create();
FetchWorkflowClusteringEnabler.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    fetchProperty: function() {
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		if (gs.getProperty("glide.platform_ml.api.enable_workflow_clustering") == 'true') {
			result.setAttribute("hideFields", "true");
		}
		else{
			result.setAttribute("hideFiels", "false");
		}
	},

    type: 'FetchWorkflowClusteringEnabler'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-20 10:14:32</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b0b8eb3bebe12110e4aaf288b552282d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FetchWorkflowClusteringEnabler</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence" source="com.glide.platform_ml">c41430683c31311068bcf327dfe37f28</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b0b8eb3bebe12110e4aaf288b552282d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:26:39</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
